subject: Sexual Harassment
Basketball
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: On the courthouse steps, Isiah Thomas flashed indignation and insisted on his innocence. Standing in a gymnasium hallway, he calmly tried to push the conversation back to basketball.
snippet: On the courthouse steps, Isiah Thomas flashed indignation and insisted on his innocence. Standing in a gymnasium hallway, he calmly tried to push the conversation back to basketball.
